root.name: Return of the Phantom
root.description: Return of the Phantom revolves around the character of Raoul Montand. Montand works for the Paris Suret√© (french national police). He's also a frequent visitor of the Opera. One day, the great chandelier at the Paris Opera falls from the ceiling, crushing members of the audience. Montand is called upon to investigate.Return of the Phantom can be played at novice or challenging difficulty level. The challenging level contains more puzzles.
